claim.body: a) a chemically patterned substrate; and b) a copolymer layer on said substrate; the layer comprising one or more isolated features registered with the underlying substrate, wherein the one or more isolated features are isolated by an unpatterned region and/or by a uniform region of the copolymer layer.
claim.claim-text: 1. A structure comprising: a) a chemically patterned substrate; and b) a copolymer layer on said substrate; the layer comprising one or more isolated features registered with the underlying substrate, wherein the one or more isolated features are isolated by an unpatterned region and/or by a uniform region of the copolymer layer.

claim.body: the one or more isolated features are selected from at least one of the following: a periodic array of spots, an isolated spot, a t-junction, a jog, an isolated line, periodic line segments, and a bend.
claim.claim-text: 2. The structure in claim 1 , wherein the one or more isolated features are selected from at least one of the following: a periodic array of spots, an isolated spot, a t-junction, a jog, an isolated line, periodic line segments, and a bend.

claim.body: the layer comprises a nested array of one or more features.
claim.claim-text: 3. The structure of claim 1 , wherein the layer comprises a nested array of one or more features.

claim.body: the layer comprises an isolated feature embedded in lamella.
claim.claim-text: 4. The structure of claim 1 , wherein the layer comprises an isolated feature embedded in lamella.

claim.body: the copolymer layer comprises two or more of isolated features.
claim.claim-text: 5. The structure of claim 1 , wherein the copolymer layer comprises two or more of isolated features.

claim.body: at least two of the two or more isolated features are of different sizes and/or pitches.
claim.claim-text: 6. The structure of claim 5 , wherein at least two of the two or more isolated features are of different sizes and/or pitches.

7. A structure comprising: a patterned substrate; a first region comprising one or more perpendicular-oriented domains of a block copolymer material overlying the patterned substrate, wherein said perpendicular-oriented domains are registered with the underlying substrate; and a second region comprising one or more parallel-oriented domains of the block copolymer material.

claim.body: one or more parallel-oriented domains are configured to act as an etch mask.
claim.claim-text: 8. The structure of claim 7 , wherein one or more parallel-oriented domains are configured to act as an etch mask.

claim.body: the one or more perpendicular-oriented domains comprise at least one of the following features: a periodic array of spots, an isolated spot, a t-junction, a jog, an isolated line, periodic line segments, and a bend.
claim.claim-text: 9. The structure of claim 7 , wherein the one or more perpendicular-oriented domains comprise at least one of the following features: a periodic array of spots, an isolated spot, a t-junction, a jog, an isolated line, periodic line segments, and a bend.

claim.body: the pattern comprises one or more regions in which the scale L s of the pattern is at least twice the scale L B of the block copolymer material in the bulk and one or more regions in which the scale L s of the pattern is commensurate with the scale L B of the block copolymer material in the bulk.
claim.claim-text: 10. The structure of claim 7 , wherein the pattern comprises one or more regions in which the scale L s of the pattern is at least twice the scale L B of the block copolymer material in the bulk and one or more regions in which the scale L s of the pattern is commensurate with the scale L B of the block copolymer material in the bulk.

claim.body: the substrate is a chemically patterned substrate.
claim.claim-text: 11. The structure of claim 7 , wherein the substrate is a chemically patterned substrate.

claim.body: the layer comprises a first patterned region comprising one or more patterned features and a second patterned region comprising one or more patterned features, wherein the first and second patterned regions differ in one or more of feature geometry, feature size, or feature pitch.
claim.claim-text: 12. The structure of claim 1 , wherein the layer comprises a first patterned region comprising one or more patterned features and a second patterned region comprising one or more patterned features, wherein the first and second patterned regions differ in one or more of feature geometry, feature size, or feature pitch.

claim.body: a substrate pattern having a first patterned region comprising one or more patterned features and a second patterned region comprising one or more patterned features, wherein the first and second patterned regions differ in one or more of feature geometry, feature size, or feature pitch; and a copolymer material overlying the substrate pattern, wherein the patterned features of the first patterned region and the patterned features of the second patterned region are replicated in the copolymer material.
claim.claim-text: 13. A structure comprising: a substrate pattern having a first patterned region comprising one or more patterned features and a second patterned region comprising one or more patterned features, wherein the first and second patterned regions differ in one or more of feature geometry, feature size, or feature pitch; and a copolymer material overlying the substrate pattern, wherein the patterned features of the first patterned region and the patterned features of the second patterned region are replicated in the copolymer material.

claim.body: each of the first and second patterned regions comprises two adjacent differently activated areas.
claim.claim-text: 14. The structure of claim 13 , wherein each of the first and second patterned regions comprises two adjacent differently activated areas.

claim.body: each of the first and second patterned regions comprises two adjacent areas having different surface chemistries.
claim.claim-text: 15. The structure of claim 13 , wherein each of the first and second patterned regions comprises two adjacent areas having different surface chemistries.

claim.body: the first and second patterned regions are separated by are separated by a uniformly patterned or unpatterned region.
claim.claim-text: 16. The structure of claim 13 , wherein the first and second patterned regions are separated by are separated by a uniformly patterned or unpatterned region.

claim.body: the feature geometry of the first patterned region is selected from the following: a jog, a bend, a t-junction, a line segment, a single spot, and an array of spots.
claim.claim-text: 17. The structure of claim 13 , wherein the feature geometry of the first patterned region is selected from the following: a jog, a bend, a t-junction, a line segment, a single spot, and an array of spots.

claim.body: a thin film of a block copolymer material, the thin film including first and second ordered regions, the first ordered region comprising linear domains of the block copolymer material having a first direction and a second ordered region comprising linear domains of the block copolymer material having a second direction, wherein said first direction is different from said second direction.
claim.claim-text: 18. A structure comprising a thin film of a block copolymer material, the thin film including first and second ordered regions, the first ordered region comprising linear domains of the block copolymer material having a first direction and a second ordered region comprising linear domains of the block copolymer material having a second direction, wherein said first direction is different from said second direction.

claim.body: the domains of the first and second ordered regions of the copolymer structure are registered with a patterned substrate.
claim.claim-text: 19. The structure of claim 18 , wherein the domains of the first and second ordered regions of the copolymer structure are registered with a patterned substrate.

claim.body: the substrate is a chemically patterned substrate.
claim.claim-text: 20. The structure of claim 19 , wherein the substrate is a chemically patterned substrate.
